hero.title: Master Sudoku
hero.subtitle: Your personal dojo for mastering Sudoku, one technique at a time
hero.description: Sudojo combines the art of puzzle-solving with systematic learning. Whether you're a beginner learning the basics or an expert tackling advanced techniques, our intelligent hint system teaches you the 'why' behind every move.

whatIs.title: Why Sudojo?
whatIs.subtitle: Most Sudoku apps just give you puzzles. We teach you how to solve them.

learn.title: Learn Real Techniques
learn.description: From Naked Singles to X-Wings and beyond. Master 20+ solving techniques used by experts worldwide.

progress.title: Progress Systematically
progress.description: 8 difficulty levels that build on each other. Each level introduces new techniques while reinforcing what you've learned.

master.title: Master Any Puzzle
master.description: Our hint system doesn't just give answers. It teaches you the exact technique to use and why it works.

step1.title: Choose Your Challenge
step1.description: Start with daily puzzles for a quick brain workout, or dive into progressive levels to build your skills systematically.

step2.title: Learn as You Play
step2.description: Stuck on a puzzle? Our smart hints highlight exactly which cells to look at and explain the technique step by step.

step3.title: Master New Techniques
step3.description: Each level introduces new solving strategies. Learn Hidden Pairs, Pointing Pairs, X-Wings, and more advanced patterns.

step4.title: Track Your Progress
step4.description: Watch your skills grow with streaks, completion stats, and time tracking. See which techniques you've mastered.

techniques.title: 20+ Solving Techniques
techniques.subtitle: From beginner basics to expert-level patterns, learn the techniques that pros use

hints.title: Hints That Teach
hints.description: Unlike other apps that just fill in answers, Sudojo's hints are designed to make you a better solver.

features.step1: See exactly which cells and candidates to focus on
features.step2: Learn the name and logic of each technique
features.step3: Apply the hint yourself to reinforce learning

example.title: "Look at row 3..."
example.description: Our hints guide your eyes to the right spot and explain the pattern, so you can find similar situations on your own.
